40859.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「この先は 神聖:
Beyond this point is the sacred Yggdrahill. Despite that, a terrible ghost has entered it...!
Just now, the priestess, Lady Himea, in pursuit of the ghost, has gone to Yggdrahill by herself. Please do something to save Lady Himea!

40861.「ほっほっほ。どうやら お前さんたちで\n 化け物の息の根を 止めてくれたようじ:
Hohoho. Somehow, it seems that you all have choked the life out of the ghost. Thanks to you, Yggdrahill was saved!
...What? You say he's not a monster, but Lady Himea's lover?

59028.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「わしを年寄りと:
<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>I can forgive him for seeing me as an old man and
making fun of me for it, but insulting Lady Himea,
of all people! Damned bastard!

33985.「この先は 世界樹の丘。我らエルフが\n 太古の昔より まつってきた 神聖な土地:
Beyond this point is Yggdrahill. The sacred land that we, Elves, have revered since time immemorial.
Soon you will receive the Trial of Wisdom, won't you? Then you may head west of Tsusukul Village to the Wisdom Altar.
There, if your wisdom is recognized, you will be granted an audience with the Leaf Spirit.

51936.「この先は 世界樹の丘。我らエルフが\n 太古の昔より まつってきた 神聖な土地:
Beyond this point is Yggdrahill. The sacred land that we, Elves, have revered since time immemorial.
If your wisdom is recognized in the Trial of Wisdom, you will be granted an audience with the Leaf Spirit.

33986.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「力の試練を受け:
You may not take the Trial of Strength, before undergoing purification at Tsusukul Village's Maiden Manor. You forgot that, didn't you?
You airhead! You better return to the village at once!

33987.「この先は 世界樹の丘。\n これより お前のチカラが 試されるであろう。\n:
Beyond this point is Yggdrahill. From here, your
strength will be put to the test. It would be best
that you prepare yourself and proceed with caution.

33988.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「なんたることじゃ…:
What's that...! Master Kou and the Leaf Spirit have lost their lives!?
Hmm... You all must hurry back to Tsusukul Village and tell the rest of the masters what happened!

33989.<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>「この先は 世界:
Beyond this point is Yggdrahill. Our Yggdrasil was saved from near-death by a divine light.
I don't know what the heck happened, but we ought to be thankful for that light.
